title: Hide and Seek (1984), based on The Adolescence of P-1
description:
Hide and Seek (1984)
based on The Adolescence of P-1 by Thomas J. Ryan

Running Time: 56:19

This made for TV movie originally broadcast on the CBC in 1984.  This file is an encoding of a DVD image which was created from a digitized VHS recording.

Hope you enjoy!
